segments.text: I’m observing an indoor kitchen scene, it seems to be daytime.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There are three people: an adult woman and two children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My attention is drawn immediately to the sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh my, the water is running from the faucet and the sink is completely overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s pouring over the front edge in a continuous sheet!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A widening puddle is forming on the cabinet doors and the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right there, drying a plate, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already in that growing puddle, but she shows no reaction at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is perfectly neutral, as if nothing unusual is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly amazing how absorbed she is in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really worry someone is going to slip on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation is just asking for an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR
